365970.name: Pixel Piracy OST
365970.description:
The Pixel Piracy OST features all of the music from the hit PC game written by Kole Audio Solutions.
Everything from the sea shanties your wee mates sing while sailing on your custom pirate ship to the pulse-pounding Combat tracks that encourage you to destroy your fierce enemies.

1) Sailing the World of Pixel Piracy
2) Little Humming Shanty
3) I'm in a Pirating Mood
4) Landlubber’s Groove
5) My Favorite Things Start with a ‘P’
6) I Hear Cannons
7) May the Best Pirate Win
8) Salty Dogs
9) Pirating Life is the Good Life
10) So Lonely at Sea
11) 9 Drinks
12) Pirate’s Jig
13) Feisty Fisticuffs
14) You Can Only Sail for So Long
15) Shoot and Loot
16) 1st Pixel Piracy Demo (Bonus)
365970.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 芬兰语, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
